synopsis.text: One young actress, Su Xiao, has always been ostracized due to her intimidating demeanor, a trait she's had since childhood. Despite her dreams of stardom, she finds herself consistently typecast as the villain. When Xiao Jian, a renowned actor and investor, witnesses an unusual encounter between Su Xiao and his manager, he becomes entangled in her web. To keep him quiet, Su Xiao signs a contract with him, sparking a complex relationship filled with power plays and unexpected alliances. As the story unfolds, Su Xiao challenges the status quo, battling against the industry's favorites to claim her rightful place in both her career and love life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
